subject: can i check a connection from junit ?
msgSnippet: hai, can i use Junit to test the connection ?, i test with Junit on JB6, and interclient 2.0 i get error message like this : java.lang.VerifyError: (class:
messageBody:
hai,

can i use Junit to test the connection ?,

i test with Junit on JB6, and interclient 2.0

i get error message like this :

java.lang.VerifyError: (class: interbase/interclient/ErrorKey,
method: _$372 signature: (Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/String;I)V)
Expecting to find unitialized object on stack

at interbase.interclient.SQLException.<init>
(SQLException.java:65)

at interbase.interclient.InvalidOperationException.<init>
(InvalidOperationException.java:66)

at interbase.interclient.InvalidArgumentException.<init>
(InvalidArgumentException.java:54)

at interbase.interclient.SQLDialectException.<init>
(SQLDialectException.java:51)

at interbase.interclient.RecvMessage.createSQLException
(RecvMessage.java:689)

at interbase.interclient.RecvMessage.createSQLWarning
(RecvMessage.java:704)

at interbase.interclient.RecvMessage.makeSQLWarning
(RecvMessage.java:578)

at interbase.interclient.RecvMessage.get_WARNINGS
(RecvMessage.java:534)

at interbase.interclient.Connection._$126173
(Connection.java:409)

at interbase.interclient.Connection._$45044
(Connection.java:331)

at interbase.interclient.Connection.<init>
(Connection.java:285)

at interbase.interclient.Driver.connect(Driver.java:204)

at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection
(DriverManager.java:517)

at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection
(DriverManager.java:177)

at database.Connect.ConnectTo(Connect.java:18)

at database.TestConnect.testConnectTo(TestConnect.java:28)
TIA

andy
